snippet: This week, the Swedish retailer unveils the Mauritz Archive, a range of outdoor clothing inspired by the brand’s early days in Stockholm.
abstract: This week, the Swedish retailer unveils the Mauritz Archive, a range of outdoor clothing inspired by the brand’s early days in Stockholm.

headline.main: H&M's Capsule Collection of Rugged Weekend Gear
headline.print_headline: A New Line:  Heritage Pieces From H&M
